attributes.action: Take immediate action to slow down the affects of climate change
attributes.background: The government have made decisions to help stop climate change but the deadline is 2050 and we are seeing the affects now, it could be too late by 2050. We should be doing everything we can now to save our planet.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038
 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518
